pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Modeling of Animal Movements // Animal movement models including Moving-Resting Process with Embedded Brownian Motion (Yan et al., 2014, doi:10.1007/s10144-013-0428-8; Pozdnyakov et al., 2017, doi:10.1007/s11009-017-9547-6), Brownian Motion with Measurement Error (Pozdnyakov et al., 2014, doi:10.1890/13-0532.1), Moving-Resting-Handling Process with Embedded Brownian Motion (Pozdnyakov et al., 2020, doi:10.1007/s11009-020-09774-1), Moving-Resting Process with Measurement Error (Hu et al., 2021, doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13694), Moving-Moving Process with two Embedded Brownian Motions.
